articles.title: 75+ Italian Love Phrases to Sweep Your Partner Away
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Italian is the language of love, and every occasion deserves the perfect romantic phrase. Whether you're on a first date, celebrating an anniversary, or simply want to tell your partner how much they mean to you, this guide has the perfect Italian words for every moment.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="L'amore √® la risposta a tutto"
  translation="Love is the answer to everything"
  pronunciation="lah-MORE-eh eh lah ree-SPOS-tah ah TOOT-toh"
  context="The perfect Italian philosophy for life and love"
/>

## Saying "I Love You" - Different Ways

### The Classic Ways

<VocabCard
  word="Ti amo"
  translation="I love you"
  pronunciation="tee AH-mo"
  example="Ti amo, lo sai?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ti voglio bene"
  translation="I love you / I care for you"
  pronunciation="tee VOL-yoh BEH-neh"
  example="Ti voglio tanto bene, tesoro."
/>

<CultureTip title="Ti Amo vs Ti Voglio Bene" flag="üáÆüáπ">
"Ti amo" is reserved for deep, romantic love - use it only with your partner. "Ti voglio bene" expresses affection and can be used for family, close friends, and romantic partners. Both are beautiful, but they carry different weight in Italian culture!
</CultureTip>

### Expressing Deeper Love

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Ti amo con tutto il cuore | I love you with all my heart |
| Ti amo pi√π di ogni cosa | I love you more than anything |
| Ti amo alla follia | I love you madly |
| Ti amo da morire | I love you to death |
| Ti amo pi√π della mia vita | I love you more than my life |
| Ti adoro | I adore you |
| Sono pazzo/a di te | I'm crazy about you |

<VocabCard
  word="Ti amo pi√π di ieri e meno di domani"
  translation="I love you more than yesterday and less than tomorrow"
  pronunciation="tee AH-mo pyoo dee ee-EH-ree eh MEH-no dee doh-MAH-nee"
  example="√à la verit√†: ti amo pi√π di ieri e meno di domani."
/>

## First Date Phrases

### Complimenting Your Date

<VocabCard
  word="Sei bellissimo/a stasera"
  translation="You look beautiful tonight"
  pronunciation="say bel-LEE-see-mo/mah stah-SEH-rah"
  example="Wow! Sei bellissima stasera!"
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Sei incantevole | You're enchanting |
| Hai un sorriso meraviglioso | You have a wonderful smile |
| I tuoi occhi sono stupendi | Your eyes are stunning |
| Sei molto affascinante | You're very charming |
| Mi piace stare con te | I like being with you |
| Mi fai sorridere | You make me smile |

### Expressing Interest

<VocabCard
  word="Mi piaci molto"
  translation="I like you a lot"
  pronunciation="mee pee-AH-chee MOL-toh"
  example="Devo confessarti una cosa: mi piaci molto."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Vorrei conoscerti meglio | I'd like to get to know you better |
| Mi sento bene con te | I feel good with you |
| Penso spesso a te | I often think about you |
| Non riesco a smettere di pensarti | I can't stop thinking about you |
| Voglio rivederti | I want to see you again |

<VocabCard
  word="Quando posso rivederti?"
  translation="When can I see you again?"
  pronunciation="KWAN-doh POS-so ree-veh-DEHR-tee"
  example="√à stata una serata bellissima. Quando posso rivederti?"
/>

## New Relationship Phrases

### Falling in Love

<VocabCard
  word="Mi sto innamorando di te"
  translation="I'm falling in love with you"
  pronunciation="mee stoh in-nah-mo-RAHN-doh dee teh"
  example="√à successo cos√¨ velocemente... mi sto innamorando di te."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Mi hai rubato il cuore | You've stolen my heart |
| Non riesco a stare senza di te | I can't be without you |
| Sei entrato/a nella mia vita | You've entered my life |
| Mi fai battere il cuore | You make my heart beat |
| Penso solo a te | I only think about you |
| Mi hai conquistato/a | You've won me over |

<VocabCard
  word="Ho le farfalle nello stomaco"
  translation="I have butterflies in my stomach"
  pronunciation="oh leh far-FAL-leh NEL-lo STO-mah-ko"
  example="Ogni volta che ti vedo, ho le farfalle nello stomaco."
/>

### Making It Official

<VocabCard
  word="Vuoi essere il mio ragazzo/la mia ragazza?"
  translation="Will you be my boyfriend/girlfriend?"
  pronunciation="vwoy ES-seh-reh eel MEE-oh rah-GAH-tso / lah MEE-ah rah-GAH-tsah"
  example="Sono pronto/a a chiedertelo: vuoi essere il mio ragazzo?"
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Siamo una coppia? | Are we a couple? |
| Voglio stare solo con te | I want to be only with you |
| Sei l'unico/a per me | You're the only one for me |
| Voglio che stiamo insieme | I want us to be together |

## Everyday Romance

### Morning Phrases

<VocabCard
  word="Buongiorno, luce dei miei occhi"
  translation="Good morning, light of my eyes"
  pronunciation="bwon-JOR-no, LOO-cheh day mee-EY OK-kee"
  example="Buongiorno, luce dei miei occhi! Hai dormito bene?"
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Buongiorno, amore mio | Good morning, my love |
| Sei la prima cosa a cui penso | You're the first thing I think about |
| Buongiorno, sole mio | Good morning, my sun |
| Che bello svegliarsi accanto a te | How nice to wake up next to you |

### During the Day

<VocabCard
  word="Ti penso sempre"
  translation="I always think about you"
  pronunciation="tee PEN-so SEM-preh"
  example="Anche quando lavoro, ti penso sempre."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Mi manchi tanto | I miss you so much |
| Non vedo l'ora di vederti | I can't wait to see you |
| Spero che la tua giornata vada bene | I hope your day is going well |
| Un bacio virtuale | A virtual kiss |
| Ti abbraccio forte | I hug you tight |

### Evening Phrases

<VocabCard
  word="Buonanotte, sogni d'oro"
  translation="Good night, sweet dreams"
  pronunciation="bwoh-nah-NOT-teh, SON-yee DO-ro"
  example="Buonanotte tesoro, sogni d'oro. Sogna di me!"
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Buonanotte, anima mia | Good night, my soul |
| Ti sogner√≤ | I'll dream of you |
| Dormi bene, amore | Sleep well, love |
| Sei l'ultimo pensiero della giornata | You're my last thought of the day |

## Flirting and Playful Phrases

<VocabCard
  word="Sei troppo bello/a per essere vero/a"
  translation="You're too beautiful to be real"
  pronunciation="say TROP-po BEL-lo/lah per ES-seh-reh VEH-ro/rah"
  example="Guardati allo specchio! Sei troppo bella per essere vera."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Hai un sorriso che illumina la stanza | Your smile lights up the room |
| Mi fai impazzire | You drive me crazy |
| Sei irresistibile | You're irresistible |
| Non riesco a toglierti gli occhi di dosso | I can't take my eyes off you |
| Sei un sogno | You're a dream |
| Vuoi un bacio? | Do you want a kiss? |

<VocabCard
  word="Se fossi un fiore, saresti una rosa"
  translation="If you were a flower, you'd be a rose"
  pronunciation="seh FOS-see oon fee-OH-reh, sah-RES-tee OO-nah RO-zah"
  example="Lo sai che se fossi un fiore, saresti una rosa? La pi√π bella."
/>

## During Difficult Times

### Comfort and Support

<VocabCard
  word="Sar√≤ sempre al tuo fianco"
  translation="I will always be by your side"
  pronunciation="sah-ROH SEM-preh ahl TOO-oh fee-AHN-ko"
  example="Non ti preoccupare, sar√≤ sempre al tuo fianco."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Sono qui per te | I'm here for you |
| Tutto andr√† bene | Everything will be okay |
| Insieme ce la faremo | Together we'll make it |
| Ti protegger√≤ sempre | I'll always protect you |
| Non sei solo/a | You're not alone |
| Qualunque cosa succeda, ti amo | Whatever happens, I love you |

<VocabCard
  word="Affrontiamo tutto insieme"
  translation="Let's face everything together"
  pronunciation="ahf-fron-tee-AH-mo TOOT-toh in-see-EH-meh"
  example="Non importa cosa ci aspetta, affrontiamo tutto insieme."
/>

### After a Disagreement

<VocabCard
  word="Mi dispiace, ti amo"
  translation="I'm sorry, I love you"
  pronunciation="mee dee-spee-AH-cheh, tee AH-mo"
  example="Ho sbagliato. Mi dispiace. Ti amo."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Perdonami | Forgive me |
| Non volevo ferirti | I didn't mean to hurt you |
| Possiamo parlare? | Can we talk? |
| Il nostro amore √® pi√π forte | Our love is stronger |
| Non voglio litigare con te | I don't want to fight with you |
| Facciamo pace | Let's make peace |

## Special Occasions

### Valentine's Day

<VocabCard
  word="Buon San Valentino, amore mio"
  translation="Happy Valentine's Day, my love"
  pronunciation="bwon san vah-len-TEE-no, ah-MORE-eh MEE-oh"
  example="Buon San Valentino, amore mio! Sei il mio regalo pi√π bello."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Sei il mio Valentino/la mia Valentina | You're my Valentine |
| Ogni giorno √® San Valentino con te | Every day is Valentine's Day with you |
| Il mio cuore √® tuo | My heart is yours |

### Anniversaries

<VocabCard
  word="Grazie per questi anni meravigliosi"
  translation="Thank you for these wonderful years"
  pronunciation="GRAH-tsee-eh per KWES-tee AHN-nee meh-rah-veel-YO-zee"
  example="Buon anniversario! Grazie per questi anni meravigliosi insieme."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Un altro anno di felicit√† insieme | Another year of happiness together |
| Ti sceglierei ancora | I would choose you again |
| Sei il mio per sempre | You're my forever |

### Proposals

<VocabCard
  word="Vuoi sposarmi?"
  translation="Will you marry me?"
  pronunciation="vwoy spo-ZAR-mee"
  example="Ti amo. Vuoi sposarmi?"
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Voglio passare la vita con te | I want to spend my life with you |
| Sei l'amore della mia vita | You're the love of my life |
| Invecchiamo insieme | Let's grow old together |
| Saresti il mio/la mia per sempre? | Would you be my forever? |

<CultureTip title="Italian Proposals" flag="üáÆüáπ">
Italian proposals are often grand romantic gestures! Popular spots include Venice's canals, the Amalfi Coast, or under the Tuscan sunset. Italians often present a ring (anello di fidanzamento) and sometimes get down on one knee (inginocchiarsi).
</CultureTip>

## Physical Affection

<VocabCard
  word="Vieni qui, ti voglio abbracciare"
  translation="Come here, I want to hug you"
  pronunciation="vee-EH-nee kwee, tee VOL-yoh ahb-brah-CHAR-eh"
  example="Che giornata! Vieni qui, ti voglio abbracciare."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Dammi un bacio | Give me a kiss |
| Tienimi stretto/a | Hold me tight |
| Voglio abbracciarti | I want to hug you |
| Dammi la mano | Give me your hand |
| Vieni vicino a me | Come close to me |
| Non lasciarmi mai | Never let me go |

## Compliments for Any Day

### About Appearance

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Sei stupendo/a | You're stunning |
| Che bel sorriso | What a beautiful smile |
| I tuoi occhi mi incantano | Your eyes enchant me |
| Stai benissimo | You look amazing |
| Quel vestito ti sta benissimo | That dress looks amazing on you |
| Sei sempre elegante | You're always elegant |

### About Character

<VocabCard
  word="Sei la persona pi√π speciale che conosco"
  translation="You're the most special person I know"
  pronunciation="say lah per-SO-nah pyoo speh-CHAH-leh keh ko-NO-sko"
  example="Lo penso davvero: sei la persona pi√π speciale che conosco."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Hai un cuore d'oro | You have a heart of gold |
| Sei incredibilmente gentile | You're incredibly kind |
| Ammiro la tua forza | I admire your strength |
| Sei la mia ispirazione | You're my inspiration |
| Mi rendi una persona migliore | You make me a better person |

## Terms of Endearment

| Italian | English | Literally |
|---------|---------|-----------|
| **Amore** | Love | Love |
| **Tesoro** | Treasure | Treasure |
| **Cuore mio** | My heart | My heart |
| **Vita mia** | My life | My life |
| **Anima mia** | My soul | My soul |
| **Caro/a** | Dear | Dear |
| **Dolcezza** | Sweetness | Sweetness |
| **Stella mia** | My star | My star |
| **Gioia mia** | My joy | My joy |
| **Passerotto** | Little sparrow | Little sparrow |
| **Cucciolo/a** | Puppy | Puppy |
| **Principessa/Principe** | Princess/Prince | Princess/Prince |

<VocabCard
  word="Ciao tesoro, come stai?"
  translation="Hi treasure, how are you?"
  pronunciation="chow teh-ZO-ro, KO-meh stah-ee"
  example="Ciao tesoro! Come stai? Mi sei mancato/a!"
/>

## Romantic Declarations

<VocabCard
  word="Sei l'altra met√† della mia anima"
  translation="You are the other half of my soul"
  pronunciation="say LAHL-trah meh-TAH DEL-lah MEE-ah AH-nee-mah"
  example="Ti ho cercato tutta la vita. Sei l'altra met√† della mia anima."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Senza di te non sono niente"
  translation="Without you I am nothing"
  pronunciation="SEN-tsah dee teh non SO-no nee-EN-teh"
  example="Lo sai che senza di te non sono niente?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Mi hai cambiato la vita"
  translation="You have changed my life"
  pronunciation="mee AH-ee kahm-bee-AH-toh lah VEE-tah"
  example="Dal giorno in cui ti ho incontrato, mi hai cambiato la vita."
/>

| Italian | English |
|---------|---------|
| Sei la mia ragione di vita | You're my reason for living |
| Non posso immaginare la vita senza di te | I can't imagine life without you |
| Mi completi | You complete me |
| Sei il mio tutto | You're my everything |
| Con te ho trovato la felicit√† | With you I found happiness |
| Il mio cuore ti appartiene | My heart belongs to you |

## Practice Exercises for Couples

### Daily Phrase Challenge
Choose one phrase each day to say to your partner:
- Monday: Morning phrase
- Tuesday: Compliment
- Wednesday: "I love you" variation
- Thursday: Romantic declaration
- Friday: Evening phrase
- Weekend: Special occasion practice

### Romantic Message Exchange
Write each other short love notes in Italian:
- On the bathroom mirror
- In their lunch bag
- As a text message
- Under their pillow

### Role Play Scenarios
Practice these situations in Italian:
1. First date conversation
2. Proposal scene
3. Making up after a fight
4. Anniversary celebration

## Quick Reference by Occasion

| Occasion | Italian Phrase |
|----------|----------------|
| Morning | Buongiorno amore mio |
| Missing them | Mi manchi tanto |
| Night | Buonanotte tesoro |
| Thank you | Grazie per esistere |
| Apology | Perdonami, ti amo |
| Support | Sono qui per te |
| Celebration | Festeggiamo insieme |
| Just because | Ti amo, lo sai? |

<VocabCard
  word="Con te ogni momento √® speciale"
  translation="With you every moment is special"
  pronunciation="kon teh ON-yee mo-MEN-toh eh speh-CHAH-leh"
  example="Non importa cosa facciamo, con te ogni momento √® speciale."
/>

Italian is the language of love, and now you have the perfect phrase for every romantic moment. Use these expressions to deepen your connection and fill your relationship with Italian passion. **L'amore vince sempre!** (Love always wins!)

<CTA
  text="Ready to master Italian with your partner? Practice with AI voice chat, save phrases to your Love Log, and your partner can be your tutor. Perfect for bilingual couples!"
  buttonText="Start Now"
/>

## –°—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è

/>

### –ü–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ —Å—É—Ç–æ–∫

<VocabCard

| –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π | –í—Ä–µ–º—è |
|------------|--------------|---------|-------|
| **Good morning** | –≥—É–¥ –º–æ—Ä–Ω–∏–Ω–≥ | –î–æ–±—Ä–æ–µ —É—Ç—Ä–æ | –¥–æ 12:00 |

| **Good evening** | –≥—É–¥ –∏–≤–Ω–∏–Ω–≥ | –î–æ–±—Ä—ã–π –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä | –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ 17:00 |

<CultureTip title="Good day vs Good morning" flag="üá¨üáß">
"Good day" ‚Äî —É—Å—Ç–∞—Ä–µ–≤—à–µ–µ –∏ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–µ —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è –∑–≤—É—á–∏—Ç —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ. –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π—Ç–µ "Good morning/afternoon/evening" –∏–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ "Hello".
</CultureTip>

### –ù–µ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è

<VocabCard
  word="Hey there!"

/>

| **Yo!** | –π–æ—É | —Å–ª–µ–Ω–≥ |

## –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–∞

<VocabCard
  word="Good morning, beautiful"
  translation="–î–æ–±—Ä–æ–µ —É—Ç—Ä–æ, –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∞–≤–∏—Ü–∞"
  pronunciation="–≥—É–¥ –º–æ—Ä–Ω–∏–Ω–≥, –±—å—é—Ç–∏—Ñ—É–ª"
  example="Good morning, beautiful! I made you coffee."
/>

### –£—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è –¥–ª—è –ª—é–±–∏–º—ã—Ö:

- **"Good morning, sunshine"** [–≥—É–¥ –º–æ—Ä–Ω–∏–Ω–≥, —Å–∞–Ω—à–∞–π–Ω] ‚Äî –î–æ–±—Ä–æ–µ —É—Ç—Ä–æ, —Å–æ–ª–Ω—ã—à–∫–æ
- **"Rise and shine, my love"** [—Ä–∞–π–∑ —ç–Ω–¥ —à–∞–π–Ω, –º–∞–π –ª–∞–≤] ‚Äî –í—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∞–π, –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å –º–æ—è
- **"Morning, sleepyhead"** [–º–æ—Ä–Ω–∏–Ω–≥, —Å–ª–∏–ø–∏—Ö—ç–¥] ‚Äî –£—Ç—Ä–æ, —Å–æ–Ω—è
- **"Hello, gorgeous"** [—Ö—ç–ª–æ—É, –≥–æ—Ä–¥–∂—ç—Å] ‚Äî –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç, –∫—Ä–∞—Å–æ—Ç–∫–∞/–∫—Ä–∞—Å–∞–≤—á–∏–∫

### –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–µ:

<VocabCard
  word="I'm so happy to see you!"

/>

- **"I've been waiting for you"** [–∞–π–≤ –±–∏–Ω —É—ç–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ —Ñ–æ—Ä —é] ‚Äî –Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –∂–¥–∞–ª(–∞)
- **"There you are!"** [–∑—ç—Ä —é –∞—Ä] ‚Äî –ê –≤–æ—Ç –∏ —Ç—ã!
- **"Come here, you"** [–∫–∞–º —Ö–∏–∞—Ä, —é] ‚Äî –ò–¥–∏ —Å—é–¥–∞

## –û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ "How are you?"

<CultureTip title="–í–∞–∂–Ω–æ –∑–Ω–∞—Ç—å!" flag="üá∫üá∏">
"How are you?" –≤ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–º ‚Äî —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –≤–µ–∂–ª–∏–≤–∞—è —Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞, –∞ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–æ—è—â–∏–π –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å –æ –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å–µ. –ù–µ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–æ ‚Äî –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ—á–Ω–æ –∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∞.
</CultureTip>

### –°—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã:

| –û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ó–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ |

| **I'm good, and you?** | –∞–π–º –≥—É–¥, —ç–Ω–¥ —é | –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–æ, –∞ —Ç—ã? |
| **Not bad** | –Ω–æ—Ç –±—ç–¥ | –ù–µ–ø–ª–æ—Ö–æ |
| **Great!** | –≥—Ä—ç–π—Ç | –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ! |
| **Can't complain** | –∫—ç–Ω—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–ª—ç–π–Ω | –ù–µ –∂–∞–ª—É—é—Å—å |

### –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ –∏—Å–∫—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã (–¥–ª—è –±–ª–∏–∑–∫–∏—Ö):

- **"Better now"** ‚Äî –¢–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å –ª—É—á—à–µ (–∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ —É–≤–∏–¥–µ–ª —Ç–µ–±—è)
- **"I missed you"** ‚Äî –°–∫—É—á–∞–ª(–∞) –ø–æ —Ç–µ–±–µ

## –ü—Ä–æ—â–∞–Ω–∏—è

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Goodbye! Take care!"
  translation="–ü–æ–∫–∞! –ë–µ—Ä–µ–≥–∏ —Å–µ–±—è!"

/>

### –§–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—â–∞–Ω–∏—è

<VocabCard

| –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ö–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç |

### –ù–µ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—â–∞–Ω–∏—è

<VocabCard

/>

| –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π |

| **Bye-bye** | –±–∞–π-–±–∞–π | –ü–æ–∫–∞-–ø–æ–∫–∞ (–º–∏–ª–æ, –Ω–µ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ) |
| **See you** | —Å–∏ —é | –£–≤–∏–¥–∏–º—Å—è |
| **See ya** | —Å–∏ —è | –£–≤–∏–¥–∏–º—Å—è (—Ä–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω.) |
| **Later** | –ª—ç–π—Ç—ç—Ä | –ü–æ–∑–∂–µ (—Å–ª–µ–Ω–≥) |
| **Catch you later** | –∫—ç—Ç—á —é –ª—ç–π—Ç—ç—Ä | –£–≤–∏–¥–∏–º—Å—è (–Ω–µ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º.) |

## –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—â–∞–Ω–∏—è

<VocabCard
  word="I'll miss you"
  translation="–ë—É–¥—É —Å–∫—É—á–∞—Ç—å"
  pronunciation="–∞–π–ª –º–∏—Å—Å —é"

/>

### –ü—Ä–∏ —Ä–∞—Å—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏:

| –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∞—è —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ |
